login.subtitle: Chart yer course through SEQTA Learn waters with this mighty desktop vessel, matey!
login.subtitle_mobile: Chart yer course through SEQTA Learn waters like never before
login.qr_description: Scan yer SEQTA treasure map to board instantly
login.click_browse: Click to hunt or drag & drop yer loot
login.how_get_qr: How do I get me treasure map?
login.enter_url: Enter yer school's SEQTA harbor coordinates
login.qr_success: Treasure map decoded successfully, ye scurvy dog!
login.qr_error_generic: Blimey! Failed to decode treasure map. Try a clearer chart, matey.
login.qr_no_code: No treasure map found in this here image.
login.qr_expired_message: Yer treasure map from the mobile signin message has sailed away expired. Request a new map and try again, savvy?
login.dev_mock_description: Replaces live SEQTA API calls with safe mock treasure.
login.position_qr: Position the treasure map within the spyglass to scan

dashboard.no_news: No tales from the harbor today.
dashboard.enjoy_free_time: Enjoy yer shore leave or tend to other ship matters.

courses.course_overview_desc: Main course treasure and ship resources
courses.select_subject: Choose a subject from the ship's manifest to set sail
courses.ai_summary_desc: Generate a mystical AI summary and actionable steps fer this lesson's treasure and ship resources.

assessments.try_different_year: Try chartin' a different year, savvy?
assessments.subject: Ship's Study
assessments.failed_to_load: Blimey! Failed to load treasure map details

timetable.failed_to_load: Blimey! Failed to chart the ship's duties. Try again, matey.
timetable.loading_message: Wait while we chart yer weekly ship duties, savvy...
timetable.no_lessons_message: Looks like there be no ship duties scheduled fer this week. Check back later or try chartin' a different week, ye scallywag.
timetable.subject: Ship Study
timetable.csv_description: Spreadsheet format fer the ship's records
timetable.ical_description: Calendar (.ics) format fer yer ship's calendar

study.page_description: Plan, track, and focus on yer upcoming ship duties, matey.
study.no_tasks_match: No duties match yer search, savvy.
study.no_upcoming_assessments: No treasure hunts on the horizon, savvy.

messages.seqta_failed_to_load: SEQTA ship mail failed to load, arr!
messages.use_cloud_messaging: Ye can still use Cloud Bottle Messages by switchin' tabs above, savvy.
messages.no_messages_in_folder: No messages in this treasure chest.
messages.subject: Message Title
messages.search_students_placeholder: Search shipmates by name, crew, quarters, port...
messages.failed_to_load_recipients: Failed to load the crew list. Try again, matey.
messages.failed_to_send: Failed to send yer message to sea. Try again, savvy.

settings.cloud_sync_description: Sync yer ship's configuration across all yer vessels with BetterSEQTA Plus cloud treasure sync
settings.cloud_eula_description: Ye must read and accept the Cloud Sync Pirate Code before usin' cloud treasures.
settings.personal_settings_description: Customize yer captain's profile and ship preferences
settings.profile_picture_description: Upload a custom captain portrait that'll appear in the ship's header
settings.language_description: Choose yer preferred tongue for the DesQTA ship interface
settings.widget_settings_description: Configure which widgets appear on yer ship's deck.
settings.only_fallback_location: Only use Backup Port for Weather
settings.dashboard_shortcuts_description: Configure quick access shortcuts that appear on yer ship's deck
settings.quick_actions_description: Add shortcuts to frequently used ship functions that'll appear as quick action buttons on yer deck.
settings.add_first_shortcut: Add yer first shortcut to get sailin'
settings.appearance_description: Customize how yer DesQTA ship looks
settings.theme_description: Choose yer preferred colors and ship theme settings.
settings.accent_color_description: This color will be used throughout the ship for buttons, ropes, and other interactive elements.
settings.theme_mode_description: Choose between daylight sailing, moonlight sailing, or follow the wind's preference.
settings.ai_features_description: Enable mystical AI powers by providin' yer free Gemini treasure key.
settings.gemini_placeholder: Paste yer Gemini treasure key here
settings.plugins_description: Enhance yer DesQTA ship experience with add-ons
settings.plugin_store_description: Install additional ship features and customizations from our add-on port.
settings.plugin_store_development: The add-on port is currently under construction. Installation and management features ain't ready yet.
settings.discover_description: Browse themes crafted for DesQTA ships — clean, vibrant, and swift as the wind.
settings.make_it_yours_description: Pick a theme that matches yer sailing mood. Switch faster than a pirate's blade.
settings.create_and_share: Create and share with the crew
settings.create_and_share_description: Use the Theme Builder to design yer own ship theme in minutes.
settings.failed_to_load_themes: Failed to load ship themes. Try again, savvy.
settings.something_went_wrong: Blimey! Something went wrong on deck
settings.try_adjusting_filters: Try adjustin' yer search or filter criteria, matey.

analytics.description: Chart yer academic voyage and treasure progress over time
analytics.failed_to_grab_data: Failed to plunder and stash the analytics treasure.
analytics.failed_to_delete_data: Failed to scuttle the analytics treasure
analytics.no_data_description: To set sail, click Plunder Data below. This will safely capture and stash yer assessment treasure locally on yer vessel. Yer treasure never leaves yer ship—everything be processed and stored privately for yer own chart readin'.
analytics.delete_confirmation_description: Are ye sure ye want to scuttle all analytics treasure? This action can't be undone, savvy.
analytics.showing_average_grades: Chartin' average treasure quality over time
analytics.no_grade_data: No treasure quality data in the hold
analytics.complete_assessments_for_trends: Complete some treasure hunts to see yer trends, matey!
analytics.grades_stable: Treasure quality remains steady as she goes
analytics.assessments_per_grade_range: Number of treasure assessments per quality range ({timeframe})
analytics.no_graded_assessments: No graded treasure found in the hold
analytics.average_grade_summary: Average treasure quality: {grade}% across {count} assessments in {timeframe}
analytics.subject: Ship Course
analytics.no_assessments_found: No treasure assessments found in the hold.

portals.failed_to_load: Failed to chart the sea portals
portals.no_portals_description: There be no sea portals currently mapped for yer voyage.
portals.click_to_open: Click on any portal to sail through to new waters
portals.no_content: No treasure found in this portal, matey.
portals.failed_to_load_content: Failed to plunder the portal treasures

welcome_portal.title: Welcome Portal
welcome_portal.getting_around_p1: Use the menu on the left to navigate. If you're on a small screen, the menu hides automatically, but you can summon it using the menu button in the corner.
welcome_portal.getting_around_p2: Use the menu to explore and see what you can find. Note that your school may not be using all of the pages.
welcome_portal.dashboard_p1: The dashboard page includes dashlets which your school has enabled (and which you can't disable!), as well as optional dashlets that you can toggle on or off.
welcome_portal.dashboard_p2: Some dashlets help you to get organised, some give you key information, and some are just for fun.
welcome_portal.timetable_p1: On the timetable page, tap (or click) on a class to access more details -- and then tap the palette button to colour up your timetable.

directory.description: Browse and search through all crew members aboard
directory.search_placeholder: Search by sailor name, display name, or crew group...
directory.no_students_message: Try adjustin' yer search or filters to find the crew ye be lookin' for.

news.no_articles_loaded: No tales could be gathered from the selected sea scrolls.
news.failed_to_fetch: Failed to gather news from the seven seas
news.no_articles_found: No news tales found in the waters.
